title: Distributor Closeout or Buyout: Selling Remaining Inventory
metaTitle: Distributor & Importer Closeouts | Sell Excess Inventory | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Solutions for distributors and importers looking to liquidate closeout inventory or dropped brands. Discrete, compliant buyouts.
summary: How to format lists, document ownership, and move inventory efficiently where permitted.

sections.heading: Quick Answer
content: Distributors often need to clear the warehouse of 'dead stock' or dropped brands to free up cash and space.
list: We buy pallets of back-vintage wine and discontinued spirits.
We require 'cleared' goods (taxes paid) usually, or transfer in bond if applicable.
Must be a direct sale (invoice), not consignment.
Discretion guaranteedâ€”we don't disrupt your current market pricing.

sections.heading: Why Sell Closeouts?
content: Holding inventory costs money (storage, insurance, opportunity cost).
list: Vintage Roll: You have 50 cases of 2018 but the 2020 is arriving.
Lost Brand: The supplier moved to another house, leaving you with stock.
Label Change: Old packaging is hard to sell to retail accounts.

sections.heading: Compliance and Transfer
list: We can purchase via the 'SL' (Special Liquor) or equivalent retail-to-retail or wholesaler-to-retail license depending on the state.
Or we purchase as a private collection acquisition if the entity is dissolving.
Paperwork must be spotless.

sections.heading: Valuation Reality
list: Expect offers at 30-50% of your original Laid-In Cost.
We are taking the risk on 'hard to sell' items.
Volume matters: Full pallets get better rates than mixed cases.

sections.heading: Common Mistakes
list: Trying to push dead stock to retailers for 2 years while the wine dies.
Sending a messy list (PDF scans) instead of an Excel CSV.
Ignoring the condition of the cardboard boxes (retailers want clean cases).

sections.heading: What to Do Next
list: Export your 'Closeout' list to Excel.
Include: Product Name, Vintage, Quantity (Case/Btl) and Case Cost.
Email it to our trade desk.
We will cherry-pick or offer a take-all bid.

faqs.question: Do you buy private label?
faqs.answer: Generally no. We buy recognized brands with market demand.

faqs.question: Can you handle 1000+ cases?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have warehouse capacity and logistics partners for LTL/FTL shipments.

faqs.question: Do you pay Terms?
faqs.answer: For new accounts, we usually pay COD or Net 7. We move fast.

faqs.question: Can I sell expired beer?
faqs.answer: No. We only buy Wine and Spirits.

faqs.question: Is this confidental?
faqs.answer: Yes. We protect your relationship with the supplier.
